definition: silt/river sludge/to silt up/choked with silt/variant of 瘀[yu1]
lit. to grow out of the mud unsullied (idiom)/fig. to be principled and incorruptible
pinyin: chu1 yu1 ni2 er2 bu4 ran3

sentences.english: Is typical of China's coastal muddy silt.
sentences.chinese: 是我國典型的粉砂淤泥質海岸。

sentences.english: I sink in deep mire , where there is no standing:…
sentences.chinese: 我陷在深淤泥中，沒有立腳之地。

sentences.english: A lot of sludge was scooped out of the base of the river.
sentences.chinese: 從河底中挖出了許多淤泥。

sentences.english: Are plugs of compacted soil produced through aeration of fairways loose impediments?
sentences.chinese: 球道中積水井蓋上散落的淤泥算不算散置障礙物？

sentences.english: Mud surrounds several of the buildings near the river’s edge and branches into adjacent streets.
sentences.chinese: 淤泥包圍了沿河的建築，並湧進臨近的街巷。

sentences.english: A purple car is partially submerged in mud. The piles of debris reach two metres high.
sentences.chinese: 一輛紫色的汽車半掩在淤泥中，廢墟堆了足有兩米高。

sentences.english: In the process of certain west lake dredging and rectification, large amount of lakebed mud is used to fill pond.
sentences.chinese: 某市西湖整治清淤過程中，大量湖底淤泥被用於填塘。

sentences.english: Air lift to suck up mud.
The river gets its yellow color for silts that are carried in the flow.
sentences.chinese: 黃河變黃色的原因是水流所攜帶的淤泥造成的。

sentences.english: And mud from the bottom of the pond can beuseused to fertilize the crops.
sentences.chinese: 塘底的淤泥可以給莊稼當肥料。

sentences.english: The river deposited silt at its mouth.
Certifiably, vacuum preloading is an effective technology for consolidating silt foundation.
sentences.chinese: 證明採用真空預壓法加固淤泥地基是行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: They come from all over the world to be slathered in mineral-rich mud from the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 他們來自世界各地只爲了塗抹死海富含礦物質的淤泥。

sentences.english: In parts it is a slick black ooze, fit only for scores of bathing water buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 有些地方是光滑的黑色的淤泥，僅僅適合於水牛洗澡。

sentences.english: All our feet were swamped in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我們的腳都陷在淤泥中了。

sentences.english: Authorities say the sludge itself will take a year to clean up.
sentences.chinese: 當局稱需要花費一年的時間來清理這些有毒淤泥。
